summary: Portable bedroll that doesn\'t require Script Dragon.
descriptionHtml:
*Update 1.2*
I added the bedroll to Adrianne in Whiterun, so you can buy it there now.
I also changed the weight to 0.5 instead of 5.
I can\'t figure out how to make it so you get the Well Rested perk, so unfortunately you\'ll have to be satisfied with just Rested.

I saw there wasn\'t a portable bedroll mod that didn\'t require Script Dragon (which I don\'t use.) So I decided to make one.
You can find the bedroll on the ground behind Warmaiden\'s in Whiterun, it looks like a wolf pelt.
Activate it while sneaking to turn it into a working bedroll. Activate the bedroll while sneaking and it\'ll turn back into a pelt and go into your inventory.

If you\'ve got any questions, just send me a message or leave a comment.
If you like the mod, please endorse.

This requires the latest version of Skyrim.
author: Elec0
